page.title: 16POST OFFICE STORES.
page.content: The present shop has in been {Figheldean since 1930's}in the same place. It is open seven days a week although Tuesday, Saturday and Sunday only in the morning. As they sell newspapers and magazines the shop is open at 7.30 a.m. {Customers can buy fresh food}as well as{packet and tinned foods, sweets and {cigarettes, shoes and slippers {hardware, toiletries, wools and {threads and toys. }It is also an {off licence. The post office provides {stamps, licences and pensions. Thursday is the busiest day because lots of older people collect their pensions and do their shopping. The owners have been at the shop for four years, they are pleased with the trade they have and think it will continue for several years yet.
